#USER# #USER# Good damn Viki, that is terrible. I'll get a truck and we can throw him into the infinite void...
#USER# We were masters at falling asleep in flight in Afghanistan, but our brain was also being cooked by MS, so how we made it at all is a mystery.
#USER# Lolz, it is the best because I have literally no memory capabilities, so I never know where shit is in the house.

#USER# Our wife was baffled by who we found attractive, because we lacked having a "type," but it always felt weird to us.
On one hand, it was trans envy. On the other, it was trans envy coupled with plurality. On the final hand, it was being ace, it was never about attraction.
#USER# Tha k you. I'm alright, I'll talk to you tomorrow

#USER# It's bad, and as someone who has been suicidal since before 10, it's triggering. But she does address what led her to post it, a friend of hers was just lost to it. Not that necessarily justifies the impact it can have, but there is more context than just the initial post.

I'm gonna be a fucking illustrator...
That's so cool.
Anyone other trans folks out there write and delete like 7 different messages to some hater because you just can't figure if it is worth it or not?
#USER# I absolutely ~hated~ my girldick, and mutilated the hell out of myself, I'm surprised it is still there honestly.
My state had maybe a year of doing the right thing and issuing EBT cards to parents for all children (even not school aged) to provide food. Like boom, done. Then of course, they took it away. #URL#
#USER# Yes, and that does not stop the dripping visceral hatred that I read in about 5 posts before stopping.

As a very outspoken schizo, this scares the shit out of me, especially living in a conservative town that absolutely refuses to vax or mask, a state that has been stripping its meger protections and controls, and a country that has a large population of "don't give a fuck." #URL#

Being goth is legalized open carry transgenderness.
Painted nails, eyeliner, long hair, fancy-ass clothes, chokers and chains.
Love being high, hate that it is such a rare occurrence. Can actually listen to the brain, those inside.
Right wingers so mad that Joe Biden brought a cat into the white house they are about to boycott pussy.

Because we all know when it comes to impartiality, nazis rank high.nnCircle the wagon back around to the fact the head guy of that club ~*really*~ dug the way America treated anyone not white, but especially the genocide and internment of the Native population.nnPro Nazi, Pro US? #URL#
Omg I Previal - Bow Down fukin' slaps...

#USER# Then DADT was repelled, but trans folks were still illegal... And eventually the transban was dropped, and in the *only* case I can find in US mil history, was reinstated by the bad one. So couldn't come out still for fear of losing my retirement for falsified enlistment.

So now we hate our pill dr.
Tricare has two options for pills, and both do not work right now, so we are stuck with someone we hate, and will eventually reject the medication thinking she is trying to control or poison us (isn't paranoia great and predictable?)

Just, like, really hate that so-called mental health providers write notes about our schizophrenia who clearly don't know the first thing about it.
"Last time she claimed she didn't have schizo"
Have you never heard this before? It's ~classic~ schizo to say "I'm not rly sick."

#USER# Congrats!!!
I don't know where I will end up falling, but it would be nice to have B/Cs. I'm not doing top surgery, so it is all up to HRT.

#USER# They just barely started considering solar input and cloud interactions, which, granted, the computers are just now coming to those capabilities, but putting solar input at like 1% influence is just a big FU to the largest goddamn source of power in our solar system.
#USER# Coming from stating with a SNES, I would have figured anything above N64 was HD lol.

Planning out my sleeve tattoos, super excited to finally back into the "I need more tattoos," mode.

Alright, this coming week means we get our bottom surgery consult and we have to pretend to be more sane than we are, just in case. Thankfully, the surgeon seems really cool and is covered in tats.

Me: Where are the lids? Wife: I moved them M: When? W: Weeks ago M: No... I've been getting them from here, just yesterday. W: No, you've been ~putting~ them there, I go behind and put them where they belong M: For how long? W: Weeks, I've been waiting for this day

If you like dogs... then literally what do you do with them? You feed them, bathe them, play with them, the reason people call them fur children. So, why do you want a "big dog," with all those responsibilities? Or do you pass those onto your wife as well? Why did you have them?
#USER# Hopefully, today is the new beginning for my lifelong dream of being an artist and a career eventually. I've been stagnant for 8 years and I'd love to change that.

#USER# #USER# Saying that you want to see an "actual example," of command being upset over a soldier getting pregnant. It is clearly implying you don't believe what is being said. That you require some extra proof because you feel the claim invalid enough to question it.

#USER# When I got fired from flight and sent to mx, I was told my ssg was a pos. He proved it by demanding I sign for a bunch of stuff without looking at it "trust me," he says. I didn't. Did a lay out, a lot missing, a lot. He started screaming at me in front of all my new soldiers 1/
The book of hurdles for trans folks, third edition #URL#
So I had to block one of the rare peeps I had foolishly considered a friend.

Fun fact, not the SGM Academy.

#USER# My mother tried to convince me I was gay and "a diva," in her words. Tried to convince me to have relations with my cousin (previous abuser), just a total mess of a life. My brother is gay and suddenly it switched to "why did this happen to ~me~, why can't I have a 'normal' kid"
#USER# It unfortunately did nothing for me, but I have MS, so I am not a good sounding board.

Probably my favorite moment flying in almost a thousand hours of it.
That little figure in the window is me, the shot was taken by our sister ship. We were practicing one-wheel landings and we got to give all the commands to the pilots to do it. #URL#
If you wanted a game streamer for "falls off the ledge the most," I'm ya fuc'kin gal.

#USER# Yeah, we have had about nine medical appointment rescheduling in the past three weeks. We are at the point of just giving up again all together about getting a dx and the proper medication. Other provider is literally trash talking us in our notes. Awesome month so far 😑

#USER# This is my rough idea board. Kinda cramped but they are L& R arm separated. So the helicopter is the outer R forearm, soldier girl is outer upper and owl is inner.
Fairy is L outer surrounded by the flowers. Then frog and Zelda are upper. Open area will be flower and crystals. #URL#

#USER# That is what they wanted to portray. A girl into computers instead of, whatever girls in the 90s did.
And... dear... god...
Do not go to the internet for opinions about her. I couldn't remember her book character, and I really wish I just stayed ignorant to it instead...

The pain of having your wife cry over the notion of the lost individual she thought she was with for 13+ years is one that cis couples will never have to deal with.
She completely accepts and supports my transition, but that does not mean there is not extreme pain for her.
#USER# #USER# Literally all of actual science, Paul. You gotta step out of kindergarten thinking, your supposed to be an adult.

We were fine with our current pill dr until our shitty social worker decided to share her "distaste," for us, saying we "jUsT fIrE tHeRaPiSt,"
So apparently, we are supposed to stay with an abusive, lying POS. We are not allowed to even have a bad fit. It just plays in our head.

#USER# I pretty much shut down new music, I barely have gotten to the point I can listen to anyone's full CD. I stop listening to most band new music after 3 albums or so because I hate being disappointed. Few exceptions, but overall, nothing new.
She-Ra, that is great and all, but do you think you could start transforming in one spot? There are flaming circles everywhere and the rednecks are starting to freak out.
Goodnight all you little queers and queerlets that reside in my phone.
#USER# I always knew what I wasn't, did a bunch of crazy stuff to try and prove otherwise, but they all failed, and it took 30+ years to put a name to what I was, a girl.

So I missed some "wrong answer as to why you are trans," convo, so I will just toss out my own:
💜I rly wanted to use cutesy txting💜

Everyone would assume that Charmander is the best bong buddy (always has a lighter) but I propose, to no one who asked, that Magmar looks like a better storyteller and Flareon must be great for cuddles.

#USER# I was obviously a backseater, but gosh I have been on some horrid training flights. The amount of info you have to know and the amount of attention you have to expend between flying, radios, navigation, crew coordination, other chalks, just mins boggling, congratulations to you.

Like fucking ahhh!!
We are literally slipping into the depths of insanity, have every fucking hallucination you can plus some, we are sleeping 3 hours a night, like what the fuck you call us a needy bitch?!
Talking about our ED like it is a bitchy excuse to not take drugs.

I literally had to split and throw my bottle away, because it is gone, and it was not empty.
Thankfully I had a refill sitting around thanks to so many medication adjustments.
It is possible I have gone as long as two weeks without it.
Which would explain my horrid last week. #URL#

T-Mobiles cell phone app cleaber is bad because it says "hey delete these apps or games to free up space) but the app or game is on the SD card, not the phone memory...
This is app warfare and we are all just playing into it...

#USER# Haha, words, that assumes I was ever okay, which I wasn't.

#USER# We have been haunted by ghosts since childhood that have followed from house to house. In Afghanistan, we started having shadow monsters, which might have existed before, but we cannot remember. They cross the boundaries of schizo and interact with the physical world.
I was wrecked all day yesterday, but I did come up with some good ideas/edits for the novel, so at least there is that.

#USER# I get up and walk out, it's all "oh no! don't gooooo! ...you gotta pay for the session still"
Then, "oh, I promise to find you a DID spec! I'll call you before COB and email you too!!!"
Guess who still has never called?
Guess who never emailed?
#USER# The Phoenix and My Songs Know what you did in the Dark, excellent.
We lied to our social worker, saying we were not suicidal, but we also might have said "we want to crawl into a hole and fucking die." so yeah, that went straight over her head.

Was really sad so we ate some weed and spent several hours digging into Lizzy's past.
We realized that we for sure, 100% knew that we were trans as a child, and our mother unit manipulated us into this sick masculinity/spouse role.

I think this character has taken my inner dissociated trauma of being attacked in the army and personifies it. All the elements line up, and my brain refuses to show me (thankfully) in flashbacks, so this mf is doing it.

We are going to try and not let these medical notes bother us today.
Because told is going to be a good day (she told herself) because it is our bottom surgery consult!
Depending on everything, hopefully within a year, we will be getting cut!

And f'uk u Grammarly (I won't even spell you correctly, bitⒸhz. #URL#

Straight up our elementary school used the children to do kitchen duty and we had to clean the silverware and trays. We had to use the giant steam dryer. We even drank from the black coffee dispenser. All we were missing were candy cigarettes from the ice cream truck. #URL#

Yay, everything went great. We don't have to get laser hair removal. The physician is starting a new practice and we should be able to have our surgery by the end of summer if not sooner. He also doesn't see our hormone treatment time being an issue.

#USER# I finished my second one as well. My beard hair used to be so thick it was ~horrible~ to shave, always bloody no matter what I did. Shave and still have a 5 o'clock shadow immediately afterwards.
My skin is still real sensitive, but doing a lot better.

As your unofficial trans mother, I want to warn the trans girls, don't fucking dye your hair purple unless you realize it might not ever come out.
Bleached and stripped my hair time and again and it's still there...
It was semi-permenant, but it doesn't want to leave.

#USER# Ellie is just ~built different~ :)
I've had insomnia since I was a child, but it has progressively gotten worse.
Just need to change my habits to start being productive in the early morning.
